name: places/ChIJLdKhw7tZwokRIzoLdGQtCUE
formattedAddress: 302 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 302 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Went to this cleaners out of pure convenience based on location to my apt. I got my bag of laundry that was washed/folded back and had several items that were torn/ripped (including a brand new pair of lululemon leggings that cost over $100). They insisted that it was impossible for a washing machine to snag them and told me it was probably mice from my apartment? I had taken my clothes there weekly and there was no attempt by them to take responsibility or rectify the situation. I can't risk having clothes ripped so I will no longer be sending my laundry here.

I got my bag of laundry that was washed/folded back and had several items that were torn/ripped (including a brand new pair of lululemon leggings that cost over $100). They insisted that it was impossible for a washing machine to snag them and told me it was probably mice from my apartment? I had taken my clothes there weekly and there was no attempt by them to take responsibility or rectify the situation. I can't risk having clothes ripped so I will no longer be sending my laundry here.

originalText.text:
I was flying out of the country for a wedding and left my dress with ample time for cleaning. I came back, a day prior to the flight, and it wasn’t cleaned. I told them I had a flight the next day and they said to come back at noon. Given that the cleaning was late (and expensive-65$ for a two piece dress with a scarf), I asked for a late delivery refund of $15 dollars. I was shut down with an incredibly rude “I don’t think so”.
Needless to say, will not come back or recommend. Incredibly disorganized and rude.

originalText.text: Don’t get alterations here. Tailored my jeans and the seams are not straight + one leg seems to have been cut in the middle then resown.

text.text: Don’t get alterations here. Tailored my jeans and the seams are not straight + one leg seems to have been cut in the middle then resown.

originalText.text: This store seems to run by different groups everyday. Very inefficient and careless, unprofessional service. My coat for dry clean and zipper fix was two days late. And they replaced my old zipper with a complete different looking zipper without consulting with me, it ruined the overall aesthetic of the coat.

text.text: This store seems to run by different groups everyday. Very inefficient and careless, unprofessional service. My coat for dry clean and zipper fix was two days late. And they replaced my old zipper with a complete different looking zipper without consulting with me, it ruined the overall aesthetic of the coat.

originalText.text: They do what they say… eventually. Make sure to follow up frequently bc they will forget to do your job or forget to send out the deliveryman after they say they will.

text.text: They do what they say… eventually. Make sure to follow up frequently bc they will forget to do your job or forget to send out the deliveryman after they say they will.
